activities: WiTopia is a provider of personal VPN services, with customers and end users of its services located in the EEA and Switzerland.  During the course of, or in order to provide its services, WiTopia may receive personal information, about current, former, or prospective, partners, vendors, suppliers, resellers, customers and clients.  When WiTopia is acting as a data controller, any personal information collected, processed, used, and transferred is subject to its website Privacy Policy and its Safe Harbor Policy.  When WiTopia is acting as a data processor on behalf of its resellers or other data controllers, the collection, processing, use and transfer of personal information is subject to the polices of the data controller and WiTopia will only process such information on behalf of the data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, offline, manually processed; customer and client data.
